description:
11.139 kerndeint
Deinterlace input video by applying Donald Graft’s adaptive kernel
deinterling. Work on interlaced parts of a video to produce
progressive frames.

The description of the accepted parameters follows.
name: kerndeint

options.description: Set the threshold which affects the filter’s tolerance when determining if a pixel line must be processed. It must be an integer in the range [0,255] and defaults to 10. A value of 0 will result in applying the process on every pixels.
options.name: thresh

options.description: Paint pixels exceeding the threshold value to white if set to 1. Default is 0.
options.name: map

options.description: Set the fields order. Swap fields if set to 1, leave fields alone if 0. Default is 0.
options.name: order

options.description: Enable additional sharpening if set to 1. Default is 0.
options.name: sharp

options.description: Enable twoway sharpening if set to 1. Default is 0.
options.name: twoway
